attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 99% of advertisements on television and other media have images of young wealthy beautiful people. This is discriminatory against old people. I would like to see regulation on advertisers to ensure that there is no longer exclusive images of these, it is ageism, and there needs to be enforced regulation of this explicit discriminatory practise, voluntary codes clearly do not work, as just looking at the adverts will tell you that.
